        &lt;div class="c-gap-top-small"&gt;&lt;a target="_blank" title="去哪儿" href="/s?usm=4&amp;rsv_idx=1&amp;wd=%E5%8E%BB%E5%93%AA%E5%84%BF&amp;ie=utf-8&amp;rsv_cq=12306&amp;rsv_dl=0_right_recommends_merge_21028&amp;euri=1664686"&gt;去哪儿&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/div&gt;

        <div class="op-calendar-new-right"><p class="op-calendar-new-right-date">2015-02-12 星期四</p>                            <p class="op-calendar-new-right-day">12</p>                            <p class="op-calendar-new-right-lunar c-gap-top-small">                              <span>腊月廿四</span><span>甲午年 【马年】</span><span>戊寅月 己未日</span>                            </p><div class="op-calendar-new-right-ticket c-gap-top">                        <p>                        <strong>电话和网络订票：</strong>                        <span class="op-calendar-new-right-ticketDay">可预订<b>04</b>月<b>12</b>日车票</span>                        <span class="op-calendar-new-right-ticketLunar">农历二月廿四</span>                        </p>                        <p class="op-calendar-new-right-ticketstat">                        <strong>车站代售点订票：</strong>                        <span class="op-calendar-new-right-ticketDay">可预订<b>04</b>月<b>10</b>日车票</span>                        <span class="op-calendar-new-right-ticketLunar">农历二月廿二</span>                        </p>                        </div></div>
    </div>

               <div class="slideTxt">高铁动卧、夕发朝至</div>

        </div>


    </div>

    <div class="bottom_copy">
	<div class="bottom_line1"></div>
	<div><br>

  <div class="c-row">
      
          <div class="c-span3" style="overflow: hidden;">

            <div class="c-span21 c-span-last" style="overflow: hidden;">
      <p class="op-answer4-title">全国铁路统一电话订票号码--官方唯一电话订票渠道</p>
      <p class="op-answer4-large">订票电话：95105105（外地订票需加拨出发地区号）</p>      <p class="op-answer4-large">客服电话：12306</p>            
      <p class="op-answer4-link">
        <a href="http://www.baidu.com/link?url=Z7Z6FB7LDjCPhiXf1jGTGARGF6FXSVBx3UCUc2ocDfJufAenpNdmHtLdNnKehSEK" target="_blank">各地区号查询</a>		 - <a href="http://www.baidu.com/link?url=Z7Z6FB7LDjCPhiXf1jGTGARGF6FXSVBx3UCUc2ocDfJufAenpNdmHtLdNnKehSEK" target="_blank">铁路客运投诉电话查询</a>				      </p>
      
      <div><span class="c-showurl"> </span></div> 
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

        <div class="op-calendar-new-right"><p class="op-calendar-new-right-date">2015-02-12 星期四</p>                            <p class="op-calendar-new-right-day">12</p>                            <p class="op-calendar-new-right-lunar c-gap-top-small">                              <span>腊月廿四</span><span>甲午年 【马年】</span><span>戊寅月 己未日</span>                            </p><div class="op-calendar-new-right-ticket c-gap-top">                        <p>                        <strong>电话和网络订票：</strong>                        <span class="op-calendar-new-right-ticketDay">可预订<b>04</b>月<b>12</b>日车票</span>                        <span class="op-calendar-new-right-ticketLunar">农历二月廿四</span>                        </p>                        <p class="op-calendar-new-right-ticketstat">                        <strong>车站代售点订票：</strong>                        <span class="op-calendar-new-right-ticketDay">可预订<b>04</b>月<b>10</b>日车票</span>                        <span class="op-calendar-new-right-ticketLunar">农历二月廿二</span>                        </p>                        </div></div>

<script type="text/javascript">var Cookie={set:function(c,e,d,f,a,b){document.cookie=c+"="+(b?e:escape(e))+((a)?"; expires="+a.toGMTString():"")+((f)?"; path="+f:"; path=/")+((d)?"; domain="+d:"")},get:function(c,b){var a=document.cookie.match(new RegExp("(^| )"+c+"=([^;]*)(;|$)"));if(a!=null){return unescape(a[2])}return b},clear:function(a,c,b){if(this.get(a)){document.cookie=a+"="+((c)?"; path="+c:"; path=/")+((b)?"; domain="+b:"")+";expires=Fri, 02-Jan-1970 00:00:00 GMT"}}};(function(){var defaultOptions={sugSet:1,sugStoreSet:1,isSwitch:1,imeSwitch:0,resultNum:10,skinOpen:1,resultLang:0},options={},tmpName;var expire30y=new Date();expire30y.setTime(expire30y.getTime()+30*365*86400000);try{if(bds&&bds.comm&&bds.comm.personalData){if(typeof bds.comm.personalData=="string"){bds.comm.personalData=eval("("+bds.comm.personalData+")")}if(!bds.comm.personalData){return}for(tmpName in bds.comm.personalData){if(defaultOptions.hasOwnProperty(tmpName)&&bds.comm.personalData.hasOwnProperty(tmpName)){if(bds.comm.personalData[tmpName].ErrMsg=="SUCCESS"){options[tmpName]=bds.comm.personalData[tmpName].value

clearCookie("bdime");Cookie.set("bdime",value,document.domain,"/",expire30y)}}function writeBAIDUID(){var BAIDUID=Cookie.get("BAIDUID"),NR,FG,SL;if(/FG=(\d+)/.test(BAIDUID)){FG=RegExp.$1}if(/SL=(\d+)/.test(BAIDUID)){SL=RegExp.$1}if(/NR=(\d+)/.test(BAIDUID)){NR=RegExp.$1}if(options.hasOwnProperty("resultNum")){NR=options.resultNum}if(options.hasOwnProperty("resultLang")){SL=options.resultLang}Cookie.set("BAIDUID",BAIDUID.replace(/:.*$/,"")+(typeof SL!="undefined"?":SL="+SL:"")+(typeof NR!="undefined"?":NR="+NR:"")+(typeof FG!="undefined"?":FG="+FG:""),".baidu.com","/",expire30y,true)}function clearCookie(name){Cookie.clear(name,"/");Cookie.clear(name,"/",document.domain);Cookie.clear(name,"/","."+document.domain);Cookie.clear(name,"/",".baidu.com")}function reset(callback){options=defaultOptions;save(callback)}window.UPS={writeBAIDUID:writeBAIDUID,reset:reset,get:get,set:set,save:save}})();(function(){var c=(navigator&&navigator.userAgent)?navigator.userAgent:"";var b=(document&&document.cookie)?document.cookie:"";

            <div class="c-span21 c-span-last" style="overflow: hidden;">
      <p class="op-answer4-title">全国铁路统一电话订票号码--官方唯一电话订票渠道</p>

      <p class="op-answer4-large">订票电话：95105105（外地订票需加拨出发地区号）</p>      <p class="op-answer4-large">客服电话：12306</p>            
      <p class="op-answer4-link">
        <a href="http://www.baidu.com/link?url=vNhL47GPacXVff_LYHbNwGL-uvIbKQ9PURt1coT-Fjp_Hzna9dBKcqoEDvTj_i-X" target="_blank">各地区号查询</a>		 - <a href="http://www.baidu.com/link?url=vNhL47GPacXVff_LYHbNwGL-uvIbKQ9PURt1coT-Fjp_Hzna9dBKcqoEDvTj_i-X" target="_blank">铁路客运投诉电话查询</a>				      </p>
      
      <div><span class="c-showurl"> </span></div> 
    </div>
  </div>
</div>
                
        

    
            
        
    <div class="c-gap-top c-recommend" style="display: none;">
        <i class="c-icon c-icon-bear-circle c-gap-right-small"></i>

        <div class="op-calendar-new-right"><p class="op-calendar-new-right-date">2015-02-13 星期五</p>                            <p class="op-calendar-new-right-day">13</p>                            <p class="op-calendar-new-right-lunar c-gap-top-small">                              <span>腊月廿五</span><span>甲午年 【马年】</span><span>戊寅月 庚申日</span>                            </p><div class="op-calendar-new-right-ticket c-gap-top">                        <p>                        <strong>电话和网络订票：</strong>                        <span class="op-calendar-new-right-ticketDay">可预订<b>04</b>月<b>13</b>日车票</span>                        <span class="op-calendar-new-right-ticketLunar">农历二月廿五</span>                        </p>                        <p class="op-calendar-new-right-ticketstat">                        <strong>车站代售点订票：</strong>                        <span class="op-calendar-new-right-ticketDay">可预订<b>04</b>月<b>11</b>日车票</span>                        <span class="op-calendar-new-right-ticketLunar">农历二月廿三</span>                        </p>                        </div></div>

<script type="text/javascript">var Cookie={set:function(c,e,d,f,a,b){document.cookie=c+"="+(b?e:escape(e))+((a)?"; expires="+a.toGMTString():"")+((f)?"; path="+f:"; path=/")+((d)?"; domain="+d:"")},get:function(c,b){var a=document.cookie.match(new RegExp("(^| )"+c+"=([^;]*)(;|$)"));if(a!=null){return unescape(a[2])}return b},clear:function(a,c,b){if(this.get(a)){document.cookie=a+"="+((c)?"; path="+c:"; path=/")+((b)?"; domain="+b:"")+";expires=Fri, 02-Jan-1970 00:00:00 GMT"}}};(function(){var defaultOptions={sugSet:1,sugStoreSet:1,isSwitch:1,imeSwitch:0,resultNum:10,skinOpen:1,resultLang:0},options={},tmpName;var expire30y=new Date();expire30y.setTime(expire30y.getTime()+30*365*86400000);try{if(bds&&bds.comm&&bds.comm.personalData){if(typeof bds.comm.personalData=="string"){bds.comm.personalData=eval("("+bds.comm.personalData+")")}if(!bds.comm.personalData){return}for(tmpName in bds.comm.personalData){if(defaultOptions.hasOwnProperty(tmpName)&&bds.comm.personalData.hasOwnProperty(tmpName)){if(bds.comm.personalData[tmpName].ErrMsg=="SUCCESS"){options[tmpName]=bds.comm.personalData[tmpName].value
}}}}try{if(!parseInt(options.resultNum)){delete (options.resultNum)}if(!parseInt(options.resultLang)&&options.resultLang!="0"){delete (options.resultLang)}}catch(e){}writeCookie();if(!("sugSet" in options)){options.sugSet=(Cookie.get("sug",3)!=3?0:1)}if(!("sugStoreSet" in options)){options.sugStoreSet=Cookie.get("sugstore",1)}var BAIDUID=Cookie.get("BAIDUID");if(!("resultNum" in options)){if(/NR=(\d+)/.test(BAIDUID)){options.resultNum=RegExp.$1?parseInt(RegExp.$1):10}else{options.resultNum=10}}if(!("resultLang" in options)){if(/SL=(\d+)/.test(BAIDUID)){options.resultLang=RegExp.$1?parseInt(RegExp.$1):0}else{options.resultLang=0}}if(!("isSwitch" in options)){options.isSwitch=(Cookie.get("ORIGIN",0)==2?0:(Cookie.get("ORIGIN",0)==1?2:1))}if(!("imeSwitch" in options)){options.imeSwitch=Cookie.get("bdime",0)}}catch(e){}function save(callback){var optionsStr=[];for(tmpName in options){if(options.hasOwnProperty(tmpName)){optionsStr.push('"'+tmpName+'":"'+options[tmpName]+'"')}}var str="{"+optionsStr.join(",")+"}";

clearCookie("bdime");Cookie.set("bdime",value,document.domain,"/",expire30y)}}function writeBAIDUID(){var BAIDUID=Cookie.get("BAIDUID"),NR,FG,SL;if(/FG=(\d+)/.test(BAIDUID)){FG=RegExp.$1}if(/SL=(\d+)/.test(BAIDUID)){SL=RegExp.$1}if(/NR=(\d+)/.test(BAIDUID)){NR=RegExp.$1}if(options.hasOwnProperty("resultNum")){NR=options.resultNum}if(options.hasOwnProperty("resultLang")){SL=options.resultLang}Cookie.set("BAIDUID",BAIDUID.replace(/:.*$/,"")+(typeof SL!="undefined"?":SL="+SL:"")+(typeof NR!="undefined"?":NR="+NR:"")+(typeof FG!="undefined"?":FG="+FG:""),".baidu.com","/",expire30y,true)}function clearCookie(name){Cookie.clear(name,"/");Cookie.clear(name,"/",document.domain);Cookie.clear(name,"/","."+document.domain);Cookie.clear(name,"/",".baidu.com")}function reset(callback){options=defaultOptions;save(callback)}window.UPS={writeBAIDUID:writeBAIDUID,reset:reset,get:get,set:set,save:save}})();(function(){var c=(navigator&&navigator.userAgent)?navigator.userAgent:"";var b=(document&&document.cookie)?document.cookie:"";

{if(window.ctwin) {window.ctwin.sendRequest("//www.baidu.com/?tn=baidu",{"content_syni":1});}if(window.performance && performance.timing) {var getPerfData = function() {var navigation = getTimingData("navigation"),dns = getTimingData("domainLookup"),connect = getTimingData("connect"),ssl = getTimingData("secureConnection"),redirect = getTimingData("redirect"),request = getTimingData("request"),response = getTimingData("response"),dom = {"start" : performance.timing.domLoading,"end" : performance.timing.domComplete},loadEvent = getTimingData("loadEvent");return {"navigation" : connect.start - navigation.start, "dns" : dns.value, "tcp" : connect.value, "ssl" : ssl.start > 0 ? connect.end - ssl.start : 0, "request" : response.start - request.start, "response" : response.value, "dom" : dom.end - dom.start, "loadEvent" : loadEvent.end - navigation.start }};var ssl_bsi = Cookie.get("__bsi");var getTimingData = function(tag) {var timing = performance.timing,start = timing[tag + "Start"] ? timing[tag + "Start"] : 0,end = timing[tag + "End"] ? timing[tag + "End"] : 0;return {"start" : start,"end" : end,"value" : end - start > 0 ? end - start : 0 }};var sendLog = function() {var logArr = [],logData = getPerfData();for(var i in logData) {logArr.push(i + "=" + logData[i]);}logArr.push("protocol=" + encodeURIComponent(location.protocol));var baseUrl = "//www.baidu.com/nocache/fesplg/s.gif?log_type=hm&type=timing&",queryString = "";queryString += logArr.join("&");if(ssl_bsi) {queryString += "bsi=" 		      	<i class="c-tool c-tool-phone"></i>
            </div>
            <div class="c-span21 c-span-last" style="overflow: hidden;">
      <p class="op-answer4-title">全国铁路统一电话订票号码--官方唯一电话订票渠道</p>
      <p class="op-answer4-large">订票电话：95105105（外地订票需加拨出发地区号）</p>      <p class="op-answer4-large">客服电话：12306</p>            
      <p class="op-answer4-link">
        <a href="http://www.baidu.com/link?url=zXJ1BAm5uA6D3Hu09at6C__gRQlEdzYSfUQa_yDtRxezTSV0Mg4t9rGkDsZ-DpQ0" target="_blank">各地区号查询</a>		 - <a href="http://www.baidu.com/link?url=zXJ1BAm5uA6D3Hu09at6C__gRQlEdzYSfUQa_yDtRxezTSV0Mg4t9rGkDsZ-DpQ0" target="_blank">铁路客运投诉电话查询</a>				      </p>
      
      <div><span class="c-showurl"> </span></div> 
    </div>

</div>

        <div class="op-calendar-new-right"><p class="op-calendar-new-right-date">2015-02-13 星期五</p>                            <p class="op-calendar-new-right-day">13</p>                            <p class="op-calendar-new-right-lunar c-gap-top-small">                              <span>腊月廿五</span><span>甲午年 【马年】</span><span>戊寅月 庚申日</span>                            </p><div class="op-calendar-new-right-ticket c-gap-top">                        <p>                        <strong>电话和网络订票：</strong>                        <span class="op-calendar-new-right-ticketDay">可预订<b>04</b>月<b>13</b>日车票</span>                        <span class="op-calendar-new-right-ticketLunar">农历二月廿五</span>                        </p>                        <p class="op-calendar-new-right-ticketstat">                        <strong>车站代售点订票：</strong>                        <span class="op-calendar-new-right-ticketDay">可预订<b>04</b>月<b>11</b>日车票</span>                        <span class="op-calendar-new-right-ticketLunar">农历二月廿三</span>                        </p>                        </div></div>

<script type="text/javascript">var Cookie={set:function(c,e,d,f,a,b){document.cookie=c+"="+(b?e:escape(e))+((a)?"; expires="+a.toGMTString():"")+((f)?"; path="+f:"; path=/")+((d)?"; domain="+d:"")},get:function(c,b){var a=document.cookie.match(new RegExp("(^| )"+c+"=([^;]*)(;|$)"));if(a!=null){return unescape(a[2])}return b},clear:function(a,c,b){if(this.get(a)){document.cookie=a+"="+((c)?"; path="+c:"; path=/")+((b)?"; domain="+b:"")+";expires=Fri, 02-Jan-1970 00:00:00 GMT"}}};(function(){var defaultOptions={sugSet:1,sugStoreSet:1,isSwitch:1,imeSwitch:0,resultNum:10,skinOpen:1,resultLang:0},options={},tmpName;var expire30y=new Date();expire30y.setTime(expire30y.getTime()+30*365*86400000);try{if(bds&&bds.comm&&bds.comm.personalData){if(typeof bds.comm.personalData=="string"){bds.comm.personalData=eval("("+bds.comm.personalData+")")}if(!bds.comm.personalData){return}for(tmpName in bds.comm.personalData){if(defaultOptions.hasOwnProperty(tmpName)&&bds.comm.personalData.hasOwnProperty(tmpName)){if(bds.comm.personalData[tmpName].ErrMsg=="SUCCESS"){options[tmpName]=bds.comm.personalData[tmpName].value
}}}}try{if(!parseInt(options.resultNum)){delete (options.resultNum)}if(!parseInt(options.resultLang)&&options.resultLang!="0"){delete (options.resultLang)}}catch(e){}writeCookie();if(!("sugSet" in options)){options.sugSet=(Cookie.get("sug",3)!=3?0:1)}if(!("sugStoreSet" in options)){options.sugStoreSet=Cookie.get("sugstore",1)}var BAIDUID=Cookie.get("BAIDUID");if(!("resultNum" in options)){if(/NR=(\d+)/.test(BAIDUID)){options.resultNum=RegExp.$1?parseInt(RegExp.$1):10}else{options.resultNum=10}}if(!("resultLang" in options)){if(/SL=(\d+)/.test(BAIDUID)){options.resultLang=RegExp.$1?parseInt(RegExp.$1):0}else{options.resultLang=0}}if(!("isSwitch" in options)){options.isSwitch=(Cookie.get("ORIGIN",0)==2?0:(Cookie.get("ORIGIN",0)==1?2:1))}if(!("imeSwitch" in options)){options.imeSwitch=Cookie.get("bdime",0)}}catch(e){}function save(callback){var optionsStr=[];for(tmpName in options){if(options.hasOwnProperty(tmpName)){optionsStr.push('"'+tmpName+'":"'+options[tmpName]+'"')}}var str="{"+optionsStr.join(",")+"}";

clearCookie("bdime");Cookie.set("bdime",value,document.domain,"/",expire30y)}}function writeBAIDUID(){var BAIDUID=Cookie.get("BAIDUID"),NR,FG,SL;if(/FG=(\d+)/.test(BAIDUID)){FG=RegExp.$1}if(/SL=(\d+)/.test(BAIDUID)){SL=RegExp.$1}if(/NR=(\d+)/.test(BAIDUID)){NR=RegExp.$1}if(options.hasOwnProperty("resultNum")){NR=options.resultNum}if(options.hasOwnProperty("resultLang")){SL=options.resultLang}Cookie.set("BAIDUID",BAIDUID.replace(/:.*$/,"")+(typeof SL!="undefined"?":SL="+SL:"")+(typeof NR!="undefined"?":NR="+NR:"")+(typeof FG!="undefined"?":FG="+FG:""),".baidu.com","/",expire30y,true)}function clearCookie(name){Cookie.clear(name,"/");Cookie.clear(name,"/",document.domain);Cookie.clear(name,"/","."+document.domain);Cookie.clear(name,"/",".baidu.com")}function reset(callback){options=defaultOptions;save(callback)}window.UPS={writeBAIDUID:writeBAIDUID,reset:reset,get:get,set:set,save:save}})();(function(){var c=(navigator&&navigator.userAgent)?navigator.userAgent:"";var b=(document&&document.cookie)?document.cookie:"";

                          &nbsp;<span style="color: rgb(0, 128, 0);">网易新闻</span>
                                      <br>
              相比之下,抢票软件只要在一个页面抢票,而<em>12306</em>网站需要进入两个页面,才开始抢票。 值得一提的是,使用抢票软件,可以选中看中的多个车次、多个席别,甚...
                      </div>
        
      
                                    
              <div class="c-row">

                  <span style="color: rgb(102, 102, 102); float: right;">2天前</span>

                      广铁客流高峰将持续至17日 乘火车掉东西可打<em>12306</em>求助
                  </a>

        <div class="op-calendar-new-right"><p class="op-calendar-new-right-date">2015-02-13 星期五</p>                            <p class="op-calendar-new-right-day">13</p>                            <p class="op-calendar-new-right-lunar c-gap-top-small">                              <span>腊月廿五</span><span>甲午年 【马年】</span><span>戊寅月 庚申日</span>                            </p><div class="op-calendar-new-right-ticket c-gap-top">                        <p>                        <strong>电话和网络订票：</strong>                        <span class="op-calendar-new-right-ticketDay">可预订<b>04</b>月<b>13</b>日车票</span>                        <span class="op-calendar-new-right-ticketLunar">农历二月廿五</span>                        </p>                        <p class="op-calendar-new-right-ticketstat">                        <strong>车站代售点订票：</strong>                        <span class="op-calendar-new-right-ticketDay">可预订<b>04</b>月<b>11</b>日车票</span>                        <span class="op-calendar-new-right-ticketLunar">农历二月廿三</span>                        </p>                        </div></div>

<script type="text/javascript">var Cookie={set:function(c,e,d,f,a,b){document.cookie=c+"="+(b?e:escape(e))+((a)?"; expires="+a.toGMTString():"")+((f)?"; path="+f:"; path=/")+((d)?"; domain="+d:"")},get:function(c,b){var a=document.cookie.match(new RegExp("(^| )"+c+"=([^;]*)(;|$)"));if(a!=null){return unescape(a[2])}return b},clear:function(a,c,b){if(this.get(a)){document.cookie=a+"="+((c)?"; path="+c:"; path=/")+((b)?"; domain="+b:"")+";expires=Fri, 02-Jan-1970 00:00:00 GMT"}}};(function(){var defaultOptions={sugSet:1,sugStoreSet:1,isSwitch:1,imeSwitch:0,resultNum:10,skinOpen:1,resultLang:0},options={},tmpName;var expire30y=new Date();expire30y.setTime(expire30y.getTime()+30*365*86400000);try{if(bds&&bds.comm&&bds.comm.personalData){if(typeof bds.comm.personalData=="string"){bds.comm.personalData=eval("("+bds.comm.personalData+")")}if(!bds.comm.personalData){return}for(tmpName in bds.comm.personalData){if(defaultOptions.hasOwnProperty(tmpName)&&bds.comm.personalData.hasOwnProperty(tmpName)){if(bds.comm.personalData[tmpName].ErrMsg=="SUCCESS"){options[tmpName]=bds.comm.personalData[tmpName].value
}}}}try{if(!parseInt(options.resultNum)){delete (options.resultNum)}if(!parseInt(options.resultLang)&&options.resultLang!="0"){delete (options.resultLang)}}catch(e){}writeCookie();if(!("sugSet" in options)){options.sugSet=(Cookie.get("sug",3)!=3?0:1)}if(!("sugStoreSet" in options)){options.sugStoreSet=Cookie.get("sugstore",1)}var BAIDUID=Cookie.get("BAIDUID");if(!("resultNum" in options)){if(/NR=(\d+)/.test(BAIDUID)){options.resultNum=RegExp.$1?parseInt(RegExp.$1):10}else{options.resultNum=10}}if(!("resultLang" in options)){if(/SL=(\d+)/.test(BAIDUID)){options.resultLang=RegExp.$1?parseInt(RegExp.$1):0}else{options.resultLang=0}}if(!("isSwitch" in options)){options.isSwitch=(Cookie.get("ORIGIN",0)==2?0:(Cookie.get("ORIGIN",0)==1?2:1))}if(!("imeSwitch" in options)){options.imeSwitch=Cookie.get("bdime",0)}}catch(e){}function save(callback){var optionsStr=[];for(tmpName in options){if(options.hasOwnProperty(tmpName)){optionsStr.push('"'+tmpName+'":"'+options[tmpName]+'"')}}var str="{"+optionsStr.join(",")+"}";
if(bds.comm.personalData){$.ajax({url:"//www.baidu.com/ups/submit/addtips/?product=ps&tips="+encodeURIComponent(str)+"&_r="+new Date().getTime(),success:function(){writeCookie();if(typeof callback=="function"){callback()}}})}else{writeCookie();if(typeof callback=="function"){setTimeout(callback,0)}}}function set(optionName,value){options[optionName]=value}function get(optionName){return options[optionName]}function writeCookie(){if(options.hasOwnProperty("sugSet")){var value=options.sugSet=="0"?"0":"3";clearCookie("sug");Cookie.set("sug",value,document.domain,"/",expire30y)}if(options.hasOwnProperty("sugStoreSet")){var value=options.sugStoreSet==0?"0":"1";clearCookie("sugstore");Cookie.set("sugstore",value,document.domain,"/",expire30y)}if(options.hasOwnProperty("isSwitch")){var ORINGIN_MAP={0:"2",1:"0",2:"1"};var value=ORINGIN_MAP[options.isSwitch];clearCookie("ORIGIN");Cookie.set("ORIGIN",value,document.domain,"/",expire30y)}if(options.hasOwnProperty("imeSwitch")){var value=options.imeSwitch;
clearCookie("bdime");Cookie.set("bdime",value,document.domain,"/",expire30y)}}function writeBAIDUID(){var BAIDUID=Cookie.get("BAIDUID"),NR,FG,SL;if(/FG=(\d+)/.test(BAIDUID)){FG=RegExp.$1}if(/SL=(\d+)/.test(BAIDUID)){SL=RegExp.$1}if(/NR=(\d+)/.test(BAIDUID)){NR=RegExp.$1}if(options.hasOwnProperty("resultNum")){NR=options.resultNum}if(options.hasOwnProperty("resultLang")){SL=options.resultLang}Cookie.set("BAIDUID",BAIDUID.replace(/:.*$/,"")+(typeof SL!="undefined"?":SL="+SL:"")+(typeof NR!="undefined"?":NR="+NR:"")+(typeof FG!="undefined"?":FG="+FG:""),".baidu.com","/",expire30y,true)}function clearCookie(name){Cookie.clear(name,"/");Cookie.clear(name,"/",document.domain);Cookie.clear(name,"/","."+document.domain);Cookie.clear(name,"/",".baidu.com")}function reset(callback){options=defaultOptions;save(callback)}window.UPS={writeBAIDUID:writeBAIDUID,reset:reset,get:get,set:set,save:save}})();(function(){var c=(navigator&&navigator.userAgent)?navigator.userAgent:"";var b=(document&&document.cookie)?document.cookie:"";

{if(window.ctwin) {window.ctwin.sendRequest("//www.baidu.com/?tn=baidu",{"content_syni":1});}if(window.performance && performance.timing) {var getPerfData = function() {var navigation = getTimingData("navigation"),dns = getTimingData("domainLookup"),connect = getTimingData("connect"),ssl = getTimingData("secureConnection"),redirect = getTimingData("redirect"),request = getTimingData("request"),response = getTimingData("response"),dom = {"start" : performance.timing.domLoading,"end" : performance.timing.domComplete},loadEvent = getTimingData("loadEvent");return {"navigation" : connect.start - navigation.start, "dns" : dns.value, "tcp" : connect.value, "ssl" : ssl.start > 0 ? connect.end - ssl.start : 0, "request" : response.start - request.start, "response" : response.value, "dom" : dom.end - dom.start, "loadEvent" : loadEvent.end - navigation.start }};var ssl_bsi = Cookie.get("__bsi");var getTimingData = function(tag) {var timing = performance.timing,start = timing[tag + "Start"] ? timing[tag + "Start"] : 0,end = timing[tag + "End"] ? timing[tag + "End"] : 0;return {"start" : start,"end" : end,"value" : end - start > 0 ? end - start : 0 }};var sendLog = function() {var logArr = [],logData = getPerfData();for(var i in logData) {logArr.push(i + "=" + logData[i]);}logArr.push("protocol=" + encodeURIComponent(location.protocol));var baseUrl = "//www.baidu.com/nocache/fesplg/s.gif?log_type=hm&type=timing&",queryString = "";queryString += logArr.join("&");if(ssl_bsi) {queryString += "bsi="                                                 	&lt;div class="opr-recommends-merge-p"&gt;

        <p class="op-calendar-ticket-tip c-gap-bottom-small">
        <strong>日历中标注订票时间为电话、网络最早订票时间</strong> <br>
        车站窗口、代售点、自动售票机延后2天出售。

        <div class="op-calendar-new-right"><p class="op-calendar-new-right-date">2015-02-13 星期五</p>                            <p class="op-calendar-new-right-day">13</p>                            <p class="op-calendar-new-right-lunar c-gap-top-small">                              <span>腊月廿五</span><span>甲午年 【马年】</span><span>戊寅月 庚申日</span>                            </p><div class="op-calendar-new-right-ticket c-gap-top">                        <p>                        <strong>电话和网络订票：</strong>                        <span class="op-calendar-new-right-ticketDay">可预订<b>04</b>月<b>13</b>日车票</span>                        <span class="op-calendar-new-right-ticketLunar">农历二月廿五</span>                        </p>                        <p class="op-calendar-new-right-ticketstat">                        <strong>车站代售点订票：</strong>                        <span class="op-calendar-new-right-ticketDay">可预订<b>04</b>月<b>11</b>日车票</span>                        <span class="op-calendar-new-right-ticketLunar">农历二月廿三</span>                        </p>                        </div></div>

<script type="text/javascript">var Cookie={set:function(c,e,d,f,a,b){document.cookie=c+"="+(b?e:escape(e))+((a)?"; expires="+a.toGMTString():"")+((f)?"; path="+f:"; path=/")+((d)?"; domain="+d:"")},get:function(c,b){var a=document.cookie.match(new RegExp("(^| )"+c+"=([^;]*)(;|$)"));if(a!=null){return unescape(a[2])}return b},clear:function(a,c,b){if(this.get(a)){document.cookie=a+"="+((c)?"; path="+c:"; path=/")+((b)?"; domain="+b:"")+";expires=Fri, 02-Jan-1970 00:00:00 GMT"}}};(function(){var defaultOptions={sugSet:1,sugStoreSet:1,isSwitch:1,imeSwitch:0,resultNum:10,skinOpen:1,resultLang:0},options={},tmpName;var expire30y=new Date();expire30y.setTime(expire30y.getTime()+30*365*86400000);try{if(bds&&bds.comm&&bds.comm.personalData){if(typeof bds.comm.personalData=="string"){bds.comm.personalData=eval("("+bds.comm.personalData+")")}if(!bds.comm.personalData){return}for(tmpName in bds.comm.personalData){if(defaultOptions.hasOwnProperty(tmpName)&&bds.comm.personalData.hasOwnProperty(tmpName)){if(bds.comm.personalData[tmpName].ErrMsg=="SUCCESS"){options[tmpName]=bds.comm.personalData[tmpName].value
}}}}try{if(!parseInt(options.resultNum)){delete (options.resultNum)}if(!parseInt(options.resultLang)&&options.resultLang!="0"){delete (options.resultLang)}}catch(e){}writeCookie();if(!("sugSet" in options)){options.sugSet=(Cookie.get("sug",3)!=3?0:1)}if(!("sugStoreSet" in options)){options.sugStoreSet=Cookie.get("sugstore",1)}var BAIDUID=Cookie.get("BAIDUID");if(!("resultNum" in options)){if(/NR=(\d+)/.test(BAIDUID)){options.resultNum=RegExp.$1?parseInt(RegExp.$1):10}else{options.resultNum=10}}if(!("resultLang" in options)){if(/SL=(\d+)/.test(BAIDUID)){options.resultLang=RegExp.$1?parseInt(RegExp.$1):0}else{options.resultLang=0}}if(!("isSwitch" in options)){options.isSwitch=(Cookie.get("ORIGIN",0)==2?0:(Cookie.get("ORIGIN",0)==1?2:1))}if(!("imeSwitch" in options)){options.imeSwitch=Cookie.get("bdime",0)}}catch(e){}function save(callback){var optionsStr=[];for(tmpName in options){if(options.hasOwnProperty(tmpName)){optionsStr.push('"'+tmpName+'":"'+options[tmpName]+'"')}}var str="{"+optionsStr.join(",")+"}";

              揭秘抢票软件秒胜<em>12306</em>:可同时抢多个方向车票
            </a>
                          &nbsp;<span style="color: rgb(0, 128, 0);">新浪新闻</span>
                                      <br>
              打开登录页面,现代快报记者发现,页面左上方显示“<em>12306</em>登录”字样。 同时,与<em>12306</em>网站一样,登录抢票软件页面显示,要输入用户名、密码、验证码。然而...
                      </div>

                      广铁客流高峰将持续至17日 乘火车掉东西可打<em>12306</em>求助
                  </a>

                      <em>12306</em>知难而进 点赞

        <div class="op-calendar-new-right"><p class="op-calendar-new-right-date">2015-02-13 星期五</p>                            <p class="op-calendar-new-right-day">13</p>                            <p class="op-calendar-new-right-lunar c-gap-top-small">                              <span>腊月廿五</span><span>甲午年 【马年】</span><span>戊寅月 庚申日</span>                            </p><div class="op-calendar-new-right-ticket c-gap-top">                        <p>                        <strong>电话和网络订票：</strong>                        <span class="op-calendar-new-right-ticketDay">可预订<b>04</b>月<b>13</b>日车票</span>                        <span class="op-calendar-new-right-ticketLunar">农历二月廿五</span>                        </p>                        <p class="op-calendar-new-right-ticketstat">                        <strong>车站代售点订票：</strong>                        <span class="op-calendar-new-right-ticketDay">可预订<b>04</b>月<b>11</b>日车票</span>                        <span class="op-calendar-new-right-ticketLunar">农历二月廿三</span>                        </p>                        </div></div>

<script type="text/javascript">var Cookie={set:function(c,e,d,f,a,b){document.cookie=c+"="+(b?e:escape(e))+((a)?"; expires="+a.toGMTString():"")+((f)?"; path="+f:"; path=/")+((d)?"; domain="+d:"")},get:function(c,b){var a=document.cookie.match(new RegExp("(^| )"+c+"=([^;]*)(;|$)"));if(a!=null){return unescape(a[2])}return b},clear:function(a,c,b){if(this.get(a)){document.cookie=a+"="+((c)?"; path="+c:"; path=/")+((b)?"; domain="+b:"")+";expires=Fri, 02-Jan-1970 00:00:00 GMT"}}};(function(){var defaultOptions={sugSet:1,sugStoreSet:1,isSwitch:1,imeSwitch:0,resultNum:10,skinOpen:1,resultLang:0},options={},tmpName;var expire30y=new Date();expire30y.setTime(expire30y.getTime()+30*365*86400000);try{if(bds&&bds.comm&&bds.comm.personalData){if(typeof bds.comm.personalData=="string"){bds.comm.personalData=eval("("+bds.comm.personalData+")")}if(!bds.comm.personalData){return}for(tmpName in bds.comm.personalData){if(defaultOptions.hasOwnProperty(tmpName)&&bds.comm.personalData.hasOwnProperty(tmpName)){if(bds.comm.personalData[tmpName].ErrMsg=="SUCCESS"){options[tmpName]=bds.comm.personalData[tmpName].value
}}}}try{if(!parseInt(options.resultNum)){delete (options.resultNum)}if(!parseInt(options.resultLang)&&options.resultLang!="0"){delete (options.resultLang)}}catch(e){}writeCookie();if(!("sugSet" in options)){options.sugSet=(Cookie.get("sug",3)!=3?0:1)}if(!("sugStoreSet" in options)){options.sugStoreSet=Cookie.get("sugstore",1)}var BAIDUID=Cookie.get("BAIDUID");if(!("resultNum" in options)){if(/NR=(\d+)/.test(BAIDUID)){options.resultNum=RegExp.$1?parseInt(RegExp.$1):10}else{options.resultNum=10}}if(!("resultLang" in options)){if(/SL=(\d+)/.test(BAIDUID)){options.resultLang=RegExp.$1?parseInt(RegExp.$1):0}else{options.resultLang=0}}if(!("isSwitch" in options)){options.isSwitch=(Cookie.get("ORIGIN",0)==2?0:(Cookie.get("ORIGIN",0)==1?2:1))}if(!("imeSwitch" in options)){options.imeSwitch=Cookie.get("bdime",0)}}catch(e){}function save(callback){var optionsStr=[];for(tmpName in options){if(options.hasOwnProperty(tmpName)){optionsStr.push('"'+tmpName+'":"'+options[tmpName]+'"')}}var str="{"+optionsStr.join(",")+"}";
